# TSPS Senior Procurement Specialist Tender Invitation
### Solicitation Number: CCSI-TSPS-SOL-0025
### Amendment Number: 3
### Tender Closing Date: March 5, 2024 at 15:00:00

The Chief Combat Systems Integration (CCSI) is inviting proposals for a Senior Procurement Specialist to support the procurement of professional services, licenses, and subscriptions to strengthen the digital backbone initiative.

**Eligible Firms:**

* The services required for this procurement are governed by the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Notice Type:**

This is a Request for Proposal against a Supply Arrangement.

**Eligibility:**

This procurement is open to all qualified bidders. The services required for this procurement are governed by the eligible trade agreements listed above.

### Key Requirements

* Develop complex procurement strategies
* Develop and produce associated procurement documentation
* Plan and coordinate procurement activities, including financial estimates, business requirements, and procurement methods
* Utilize Temporary Help, ProService, Task-Based Informatics Professional Services, and Task Solutions Professional Services Supply Arrangements
* Conduct day-to-day procurement operations

### Award Criteria:

The following criteria will be used to award the contract:
* Relevance to the solicitation requirements
* Quality of the bid response
* Past performance

Please note that the solution period is expected to be approximately 12 months, starting from March 25, 2024, to March 23, 2025.

**Attachments:**

The solicitation documents can be found in the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) which can be accessed at the following link: 
[https://canadabuys.canada.ca/](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/)

For questions or concerns regarding this solicitation, please contact Captain Steven Irving at (613) 904-5232 or email at [steven.ir
